result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert W Neas was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: La Crosse County Clerk of Court
Robert W Neas
parties.address: 1749 La Crescent St 24, La Crosse, WI 54603

supervisions.notes:
The defendant has 60 days to report to jail and if he can get on his medications and not have any police contact between now and then, the Court will Vacate the remainder of the jail sentence.  The def is to check in with Justice Support Services during the next 60 days to verify that he is seeing his doctor, taking all prescribed medications as directed and that he hasn't gotten into any more trouble

Court costs/fees are converted to a Civil Judgment
,
Concurrent with: Concurrent with La Crosse Co case 15CM532
.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert W Neas

defendant.name: Neas, Robert W
defendant.address: 1749 La Crescent St 24, La Crosse, WI 54603

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Request for Modification or Change in Sentence filed
RAG: denied - pending case still open

for Sentence Modification - didn't know he had to stay away from KT on French Isl. - request to be released & given another chance
Per RAG:  Denied

State by Barton / Def in custody w/ Atty Tom Huh
Barton will file Amended Complaint after CRT
Plea Quest & Waiver filed
Ct 1 (w/o Repeater) - Def pleads GUILTY
CRT:  Plea is FVI made - sufficient factual basis exists - CRT finds def guilty
CRT'S SENTENCE:  Def to serve 120 days CJ w/ credit for 45 days Concurrent w/ 15CM532 - Def has 60 days to report to jail & if he can get on his meds & not have any police contact between now & then, the CRT will vacate the remainder of jail sentence.  Def to check in w/ JSS during the 60 days to verify he is seeing his Dr. & taking prescribed meds as directed & that he hasn't gotten into any more trouble.  Restitution is converted to a Civil Judgment as well as Court costs/fees will be converted to a Civil Judgment
from Tom Huh   to: Cindy, Br 1    re: wanted to make sure we have all Neas's files for Monday's plea:  15CM532, 15CM533, 15CM890, 15CM920, 15CM938, 15CM991 & 15CM1001

$250.00 Cash Bond (already posted) covers all files
(15CM532, 15CM533, 15CM890, 15CM920, 15CM938, 15CM991)
With conditions: No Contact with Kwik Trip Stores or
Freedom Gas Station.
No alcohol or controlled substances w/out a valid prescription.
Comply with JSS conditions - testing
Comply with Mental Health provider and JSS and reside in a
residence approved by them.
Take all medications as prescribed.

from JSS   re: concerns w/ def's bond conditions.  Bond does not say that def is to comply w/ JSS.  Would this be something CRT would add so JSS can follow-up to ensure that def is addressing his mental health concerns?  A referral was made to Care Center but that is not an option at this time.  Due to def's insurance being inactive due to his being in custody, services cannot be set up for him right now.  This is something def would have to do once he's released & gets his insurance reactivated.
Per RAG:  That would be sufficient to address his menthal health

from Jeff, JSS   re: bond condition requires a residence be verified prior to def being released.  Def was approved to stay w/ family member, but only to 7-5-15 because they will be leaving town.  Def req to stay w/ this relative until then & work on a more permanent arrangement between now & 7-5-15 - will CRT approve this?
PER RAG:  YES

Request for Modification or Change in Sentence filed
TWB: denied

State by Keller / Def in custody w/ Atty Tom Huh
Copy of Complaint to Atty
Pre-trial report filed
Def stands mute - NG plea entered
$1000 Signature bond signed by def (covers both 15CM532 & 15CM533) w/ conditions:  Def is to comply w/ mental health trmt & inpatient trmt if deemed approp by JSS;  Residence to be approved by JS - JS to check & see if there is room for def @ Crisis Center
State:  Def may be sitting on a sentence
CRT STAYS any other sentence, however, def is to remain in jail until a residence is approved for him
